column1: Maarssen (pronunciation ) is a town in the middle of the Netherlands
column3: along the river Vecht and the Amsterdamâ€“Rhine Canal. The west of Maarssen is called Maarssen-Broek whereas the east is called Maarssen-Dorp. Both put together and joined by other small towns around provide the area of Maarssen.

column2: 2011 Maarssen merged with the councils of Breukelen and Loenen to become Stichtse Vecht.
